title: Number of Pokémon GO daily users in the U.S. 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 4 number of Months.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
Month July 19 has 2.14 times more Number of users in millions than Month July 12 which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 4 number of Months.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
Month July 19 has 2.14 times more Number of users in millions than Month July 12 which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month July 19 has the highest Number of users in millions and July 12 has the lowest Number of users in millions.
The second highest Number of users in millions is appeared to be the Month August 16.
The difference of Number of users in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 24.0.
Number of users in millions at Month July 19 is 45.0 , second place is August 16 at 30.0, and thirdly is July 14 at 25.0.
Overall Number of users in millions has reduced over the Months.
The average Number of users in millions in all 4 Months is 30.25.
